Ricky said, "Tea Brains are racists" When White Europeans have been intentionally reduced to 1% of the world population and are pleading for help to stop the genocide against them, you will claim their pleadings are RACISTS. Because you are the racist. And so are those perpetrating our demise.

Message.Title: Bongo&Biden met in oval office with illegal aliens
Message.Msg: However American citizens can no longer tour the White House. Massa Bongo Bongo cancelled tours - too expensive he sez. President Barack Obama and Vice President Joe Biden met in the Oval Office on Tuesday with three people who are in the country in violation of U.S. immigration laws but who have received “deferred action” allowing them to stay in the country under the terms of a “memorandum” issued unilaterally last year by Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano.

No one called him a punk. But what if he was behaving like a thug and the Latino fella was defending himself? In such case, are you suppose to let a punk beat ya to death or permanently maim you, because he looks like a Massa Bongo Bongo`s son(in other words BLACK)? Ya can forget it bubba, if that`s what you and your type are suggesting. Maybe that`s why ya`ll want to disarm Whites. So we have no way to defend ourselves, and we can easily be eliminated.

Message.Title: Administrative charges? Is the good news worth writing home about?
Message.Msg: Yes and no. First the yes part. In an environment where making the numbers or missing the them by just "one" penny is surely and important factor to consider. The newly announced administrative charges will add only "one" penny to the earnings per year. And then the no part. Increasing the earnings by just one penny can be viewed as rather insignificant.
You are what you are and you demonstrate it repeatedly.
Another bald lie from fake ricky. You are what you are.
You may call yourself a Christian. You may call yourself a patriot. You may call yourself a conservative. But all you are is a lowlife and a liar, fake ricky.
Jon, you and winholder have decided it is somehow ok to insult my father because I mentioned he served his country in Vietnam. It is not ok. It only serves to demonstrate what lowlife #$%$ you are.

No, pin, it stopped in May 2012. The Cincinnati office was told once to braoden their criteria, it did not take, and then told again. Finally the IRS requested review of incident by the IG. By the time the IG report was presented to the White House earlier this month the issue had been resolved. I am not sure why you think a resolved issue in one IRS office merits the president's attention. If you want to get the bottom of what happened within the IRS, that's one thing. Same with Benghazi. But all you seem intent on doing in both cases is desperately trying to pin something on the President. What is really happening is the economy is recovering nicely, the deficit is shrinking rapidly, and you need to change the subject to something negative.

If someone committed a crime then by all means investigate. The FBI investigates crime and corruption every day. But what Americans care about is ending the 501(c)4 system and fixing our campaign finance system in the first place. At its core it is unethical, unworkable and ripe for abuse. The fact is that the Tea Brains may have been treated unequally, but the outcome for those groups was the correct outcome. The outcome for the groups that got through was the incorrect one. So fix the system. But all you Tea Brains want to do is pin something on Obama.

Outside of here I hear little about this. I'm sure it is being reported extensively in the conservative media, just as the birther nonsense was. Most people who develop their own opinions on matters see this as a problem internal to the IRS. There are some questions of whether civil rights violations were committed and whether there was some "reluctance" to inform Congress that may prove criminal. Some heads may roll, but that it doesn't really have anything to do with the administration. In the end your focus on the incident and your attempts to pin it on Obama is simply revealing you people for what you are--cheap partisan hacks. You say Obama created an environment that leads to disrespect for the Tea Party? The Tea Party has demonstrated itself time and again to not be worthy of respect. You are treated the way you are treated because of what you are, not because of Obama.
Learn English, moron.

Mr. Sciacca, as a retired AT&T employee I have questions, where do you live ( rural or big city), are the main cables buried or aerial, do you know how old the cable is ( prior to about 1950 they had pulp insulation,, which I'm sure you're aware of), and are there square transformers on the poles opposed to round ones? I have done all of the job duties from the central office to T1 installation and repair. But I'm not real famailiar with the central office as the central office technicians. As a cable repair tech I have seen some weird things interfere with internet service. My 15 years of experience in cable repair gave me a good back ground in building DSL and T1 pairs. But if the technicians have tried all of the "simple" fixes then it's time for a Tier II tech to analyze it. It could be a central office problem but it could also be too many dsl subscribers in the same 25 pair group causing your internet trouble but if your 'pots' service is dropping at the same time it sounds more like a central office problem or a high open in a pulp cable. I wish I could see the situation. Tier II can actually put a monitor on your line that records the loss and helps isolate. When I was a T1 tech we did that on a chronic problem and found that every time a train went past a repeater case it was causing the outage. We replaced the repeater case and the repeaters would fit in the slots tighter and the problem was solved. As a suggestion of courtesy I would ask that you not post the names of the employees that are trying to help you. It could create a violation of their privacy and they are doing their best to solve your problem.

Lewcor, I no longer live in Florida. It`s too bad, I think I would have loved Florida of 20 years or more ago, even though the Florida summers are brutal for me. I lingered in Florida debating whether to move, it just seemed like I should like it. However, that poor young White man swallowed by a sink hole who in a matter of hours was covered with dirt with no apparent effort whatsoever to rescue him, and then the N Dakota family who had their children kidnapped by Child Protective services in Jacksonville, after only being there 3 days to get medical help for their toddler, well both of those incidents really creeped me out. Jolted me into the realization that no way did I want to grow old and possibly infirm in Florida if that`s how they treat vulnerable White people. AND I simply do not want to live around hordes of non Whites as a minority, with them controlling and dictating culture and society, which is what so much of Florida is now. Also, I never felt good in Florida. I don`t know if I just wasn`t cut out for that climate or if it is an unhealthy environment. They sprayed the skies INCESSANTLY in Jacksonville, where I lived. It made sick just to look up at the sky.

" White people, including the parents of the victims, hate you. And don't you forget it. " Believe me, I know that. I have felt more hate for my White skin and desire to live in a White society than you will ever even begin to understand, icky. You know, after the incident in Jacksonville where the White guy killed the Black teen, supposedly because of loud music and according to the White because they threatened him with a gun(of course there were no cameras to back up his story that they or one of them left of the scene for awhile), there were Blacks who turned up their offensive repulsive music so loud that you were forced to listen to it if stopped at a red light. Whenever that happened to me, I simply turned up my country music even louder. Let me tell you, they were ENRAGED that Whitey dared to do the same thing they did. I would get HATE stares you would not believe. But you know what was even worse. When some ignorant White teen or young adult pulled up next to me with their hats turned backwards playing the same music. As though trying to imitate their colored betters. Some of them not even with hats turned backwards, driving expensive cars and pretending to be cool sophisticates. Ignorant types who viewed me and my hillbilly music as backwards. Those are the most offensive of all, to me personally. Icke icke icke, IIIIIkey, I want to get TOTALLY away from them too.

Make sure you get a tech that knows what he is doing. I am a retired PT&T tech. I had trouble with my internet service and several men came out with no results. I got sick of it and called company headquarters in Frisco. A very nice lady put me in touch with an officer of the company. I told him my problem. He told me someone would be out first thing the next morning. The man came and had the problem fixed quickly. (C.O. problem) He then asked me how I rated such attention. I said I had just gotten in touch with the right party.

New one on me. Train shaking loose repeaters. Ran into lots of odd problems but never that one. All the carrier lines I worked on were underground and not close to rail lines. Pulp cable was never the basic cause of trouble. We used some that had been placed in the 1920's. I retired in 1983 with 30 years service.
yeah dont trust the cwa..we have been screwed over by the cwa in connecticut...if it smells like **** it must be ****

Topic.Title: USAA insurance running a scam. If your house burns they don't pay you on the spot (full payment option). They force you to rebuild and use their low bid and then nickel and dime you to death. Switch to a full payment up front company! not the same co. 20 years ago switch to Chubb, etc. USAA and Robles== RICO at its finest

Message.Msg: I don't like this company at all,I filled out a credit application which they said would cost $50.00 which is fine and they said they would put it on my credit card.Well they did but took it as a cash advance resulting in me paying the FEE and interest for the advance.Two things happened here for the first time,I never pay interest and NEVER take cash advances.If you do business with these people,be cautious and read the fine print.
